title: Sangean All in One Surround Sound Bluetooth AM/FM Dual Alarm Clock Radio with Large Easy to Read Backlit LCD Display
features: Bluetooth - Enjoy convenient Bluetooth connectivity with compatible devices and stream audio without wires
AM/FM Radio - A built-in digital FM/AM Stereo Tuner lets you choose from a wide variety of radio, talk and music programming
Built-In Speaker - The Radio delivers powerful audio for its size from its built-in 3" speaker, with bass and treble tone controls let you further adjust the sound to your liking
Auxiliary Input - A 3.5mm Aux-in socket allows you to Connect external devices like your iPod, iPhone, MP3 or CD player or other portable digital music players
Headphone Jack - A headphone output lets you enjoy radio programming in private with improved sound clarity in noisy environments
description: Sangean Bluetooth AM/FM Radio with Large Display

The Sangean Compact Wooden Cabinet Radio Receiver is an attractively styled portable radio with simplicity and function in mind and it offers a combination of features for enjoyable AM/FM radio listening
Large display
An easy-to-read segment-style LCD screen is backlit to be easy to see even across the room and for night viewing
Bluetooth
Enjoy convenient Bluetooth connectivity with compatible devices and stream audio without wires
AM/FM Radio
A built-in digital FM/AM Stereo Tuner lets you choose from a wide variety of radio, talk and music programming
Dual Alarms
Set two separate wake times with the dual alarm feature one for you, one for your partner
Snooze & Sleep timer
Allows you to wake or fall asleep to your favorite radio, talk and music programming
Mega Bass
Bass Reflex Speaker System and MEGA BASS for rich, deep low tones and a more powerful, crisp overall sound
Built-In Speaker
The Radio delivers powerful audio for its size from its built-in 3" speaker, with bass and treble tone controls let you further adjust the sound to your liking
Auxiliary Input
A 3.5mm Aux-in socket allows you to Connect external devices like your iPod, iPhone, MP3 or CD player or other portable digital music players
Headphone Jack
A headphone output lets you enjoy radio programming in private with improved sound clarity in noisy environments
Remote control
Allows you to make system adjustments from a comfortable distance
